LanguageData.VWE_ComfortGrip.stages.0.label: comfortable gun
LanguageData.VWE_ComfortGrip.stages.0.description: The custom-molded, ergonomic handle wrapped in high-quality leather feels reassuringly secure in my hand.
LanguageData.VWE_GrimNotches.stages.0.label: grim gun
LanguageData.VWE_GrimNotches.stages.0.description: It seems there’s 20 notches on this pistol. Who knows what lives it has taken.
